properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TABLE A

SELECT A.RNUM, A.ORDER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.STORE_NAME, A.ORDER_TIME, A.TOTAL_AMOUNT, A.USER_PHONE, A.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.ORDER_CODE, B.USER_NAME, B.STORE_NAME, B.ORDER_TIME, B.TOTAL_AMOUNT, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT C.ORDER_CODE, D.USER_NAME, E.STORE_NAME, C.ORDER_TIME, C.TOTAL_AMOUNT, D.USER_PHONE, F.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM ORDER_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE E ON(C.STORE_CODE = E.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE F ON(E.USER_CODE = F.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.ORDER_CODE DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT C.MENU_NAME, C.PRICE FROM ORDER_DETAIL A JOIN BASKET B ON(A.CART_CODE = B.CART_CODE) JOIN MENU C ON(B.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = ?

SELECT B.USER_NAME, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_ADDRESS, A.REQUEST, C.STORE_NAME, D.USER_PHONE "Stophone", C.STORE_ADDR FROM ORDER_TABLE A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON (A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE C ON (A.STORE_CODE = C.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE D ON (C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = ?
SELECT A.ROLE_CODE FROM USER_TABLE A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?
SELECT A.USER_PWD FROM USER_TABLE A WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_PHONE , A.USER_ADDRESS , A.POINT , A.USER_EMAIL , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.ROLE_CODE , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.BLACKLIST_DATE , A.USER_NO FROM USER_TABLE A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TABLE WHERE ORDER_CODE = ?
COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TABLE A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON(A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TABLE A JOIN STORE_TABLE B ON(A.STORE_CODE = B.STORE_CODE) WHERE B.STORE_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM, A.ORDER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.STORE_NAME, A.ORDER_TIME, A.TOTAL_AMOUNT, A.USER_PHONE, A.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.ORDER_CODE, B.USER_NAME, B.STORE_NAME, B.ORDER_TIME, B.TOTAL_AMOUNT, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT C.ORDER_CODE, D.USER_NAME, E.STORE_NAME, C.ORDER_TIME, C.TOTAL_AMOUNT, D.USER_PHONE, F.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM ORDER_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE E ON(C.STORE_CODE = E.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE F ON(E.USER_CODE = F.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.ORDER_CODE DESC ) B
WHERE B.ORDER_CODE = ? ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM, A.ORDER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.STORE_NAME, A.ORDER_TIME, A.TOTAL_AMOUNT, A.USER_PHONE, A.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.ORDER_CODE, B.USER_NAME, B.STORE_NAME, B.ORDER_TIME, B.TOTAL_AMOUNT, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT C.ORDER_CODE, D.USER_NAME, E.STORE_NAME, C.ORDER_TIME, C.TOTAL_AMOUNT, D.USER_PHONE, F.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM ORDER_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE E ON(C.STORE_CODE = E.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE F ON(E.USER_CODE = F.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.ORDER_CODE DESC ) B
WHERE B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM, A.ORDER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.STORE_NAME, A.ORDER_TIME, A.TOTAL_AMOUNT, A.USER_PHONE, A.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.ORDER_CODE, B.USER_NAME, B.STORE_NAME, B.ORDER_TIME, B.TOTAL_AMOUNT, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT C.ORDER_CODE, D.USER_NAME, E.STORE_NAME, C.ORDER_TIME, C.TOTAL_AMOUNT, D.USER_PHONE, F.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM ORDER_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE E ON(C.STORE_CODE = E.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE F ON(E.USER_CODE = F.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.ORDER_CODE DESC ) B
WHERE B.STORE_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_TABLE WHERE USER_CODE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_TABLE WHERE OWNER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_TABLE A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON(A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_TABLE A

SELECT A.RNUM, a.user_code, A.user_name, a.store_name, a.owner_no, a.store_addr, a.ENROLL_DATE, a.APPROVAL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.user_code, B.user_name, B.store_name, B.owner_no, B.store_addr, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.APPROVAL FROM(SELECT C.user_code, D.user_name, C.store_name, C.owner_no, C.store_addr, C.ENROLL_DATE, C.APPROVAL FROM STORE_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.USER_CODE ASC )B
)A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM, a.user_code, A.user_name, a.store_name, a.owner_no, a.store_addr, a.ENROLL_DATE, a.APPROVAL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.user_code, B.user_name, B.store_name, B.owner_no, B.store_addr, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.APPROVAL FROM(SELECT C.user_code, D.user_name, C.store_name, C.owner_no, C.store_addr, C.ENROLL_DATE, C.APPROVAL FROM STORE_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.USER_CODE ASC )B WHERE B.USER_CODE = ? )A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM, a.user_code, A.user_name, a.store_name, a.owner_no, a.store_addr, a.ENROLL_DATE, a.APPROVAL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.user_code, B.user_name, B.store_name, B.owner_no, B.store_addr, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.APPROVAL FROM(SELECT C.user_code, D.user_name, C.store_name, C.owner_no, C.store_addr, C.ENROLL_DATE, C.APPROVAL FROM STORE_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.USER_CODE ASC )B WHERE B.OWNER_NO = ? )A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM, a.user_code, A.user_name, a.store_name, a.owner_no, a.store_addr, a.ENROLL_DATE, a.APPROVAL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.user_code, B.user_name, B.store_name, B.owner_no, B.store_addr, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.APPROVAL FROM(SELECT C.user_code, D.user_name, C.store_name, C.owner_no, C.store_addr, C.ENROLL_DATE, C.APPROVAL FROM STORE_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.USER_CODE ASC )B WHERE B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' )A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.OWNER_NO, A.STORE_NAME, A.STORE_CODE, A.CATEGORY, A.STORE_ADDR, B.USER_PHONE, C.TYPE_NAME FROM STORE_TABLE A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON(A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) JOIN TYPE_LIST C ON(A.TYPE_CODE = C.TYPE_CODE) WHERE A.STORE_CODE = ?
